name: Solar Parasite
description:
Take on entire solar systems as you refuel for your next warp in SOLAR PARASITE. SpaceY sends a satellite equipped with rudimentary AI with the soul purpose of exploring the universe. The satellite gains intelligence by harvesting asteroids and enhancing its technology. Eventually, the AI invents warp tech, but it costs the mass of a star to fuel a warp. In pursuit of the AI's goal, it consumes entire solar systems while being very successful in its purpose. How To Play: * Send out probes to connect to planets and collect their resources. * Collect materials from reachable planets to use in the upgrade menu to upgrade your satellite. * Once you feel the time is right, mine the sun to fuel your warp.

Controls:

Left click on a planet to send out probes (multiple can be sent depending on your upgrades). Right click on a planet to retrieve all probes connected to it.
